text: wamma man 'uety sahifat 'aemalah min wara' zhrh, wahu alkafir ballh, fasawf yadeu balhlak walthbwr, wayadkhul alnaar mqasyana hrha. 'iinah kan fi 'ahlih fi aldunya msrwrana mghrwrana, la yufakir fi alewaqb, 'iinah znn 'an lan yarjie 'iilaa khalqh hayaan llhsab. bla syeydh allah kama bada'ah wyjazyh ealaa aemalh, 'iina rabah kan bih bsyrana elymana bhalh min yawm khalaqah 'iilaa 'ana bethh
